title: Best of The Program | Guest: Chad Prather | 10/7/21
description:
Did the attorney general ask the FBI to look into parents as domestic terrorists? Fact-checkers are fighting it but Sen. Ted Cruz pushed back. Some left-wing economists have a wild idea to pay off the debt without borrowing more. BlazeTV host Chad Prather joins Glenn to discuss his new book “Am I Crazy?” and how he would govern the state of Texas.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
